ai-tha-ap376:1.3_0: all the people have come together.
ai-tha-ap376:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap376:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap376:3.4_0: are like fruits in a body;
ai-tha-ap376:4.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
ai-tha-ap376:5.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap376:5.2_0: to be in the presence of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap376:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pañcasikha.
ai-tha-ap376:8.1_0: he took the fourth Elder Nun Covered.
